title: Inoculating Grain Spawn from Midwest Grow Kits - Bulk Growing Series (pt. 1)

tasks.task: Cultivate mushrooms indoors using a spore syringe in modified plastic bins.
subtasks: Prepare the inoculation area for sterility.
Use a spore syringe to inoculate grain spawn bags.
Disperse spores evenly across the grain surface.
Sterilize the syringe needle before each inoculation.
Incubate inoculated bags in a warm, sterile environment.

tasks.task: Maintain a sterile environment during spore inoculation.
subtasks: Close all vents, windows, and lock out pets.
Wipe down working surfaces with 70% isopropyl alcohol.
Wear gloves and a mask during the process.
Use alcohol wipes to clean syringe components.

tasks.task: Set up and use a spore syringe for grain spawn inoculation.
subtasks: Open and unroll the tape on the spawn bag.
Make a small cut in the seal to access the bag.
Disinfect the injection port with alcohol before use.
Remove and replace the needle on the spore syringe.
Adjust spore solution consistency as needed.
Shake the spore syringe and ensure even distribution.
Check regularly during the incubation period (4-6 weeks).
Watch for discoloration, chalky texture, or dust-like appearance.
Address contamination by isolating affected areas or discarding contaminated materials.
